meanings.definition: A building separate from but located on the same property as a main building.
meanings.sent1: The farm had small outbuildings for storing tools and equipment.
meanings.sent2: The outbuildings on the estate included a barn and a shed.
meanings.sent3: The outbuildings were like little helpers, always nearby but never in the way.
meanings.sent4: The outbuildings stood like loyal companions to the main house.
meanings.sent5: The outbuildings dotted the landscape, adding charm to the property.

meanings.definition: Buildings on a property that are not part of the main structure.
meanings.sent1: The outbuildings behind the house were used for storage and workshops.
meanings.sent2: She explored the outbuildings, curious about their purpose.
meanings.sent3: The outbuildings seemed to gossip among themselves about the main house.
meanings.sent4: The outbuildings cast long shadows in the evening sun.
meanings.sent5: The outbuildings provided a sense of privacy on the property.
